pr_title: Wip/6.0 Fix HashMap constructor with expected size usage error

timeline.message: fix HashMap constructor with expected size usage error
fix HashMap constructor with expected size usage error

timeline.bodyText: There is a bug in old implementation. Different than HashMap or HashSet, ConcurrentHashMap will perform sizing computation internally so we don't need to compute on top of that.
timeline.author: NathanQingyangXu

timeline.bodyText: No need to use the util method in CollectionHelper for ConcurrentHashMap constructor is enough for it will compute the size internally.
timeline.author: NathanQingyangXu
